description: This quick and easy tray bake is a simple way to cook white fish fillets, perfect with light lemony greens.
name: Miso Roasted White Fish with Lemon Greens Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Brush half the oil on the cod fillets, coating both sides.
Add the remaining oil to a large bowl along with lemon juice and zest, garlic and cracked black pepper. Toss in the green vegetables and mix well to coat.
Spread the vegetables out on a large baking tray and cook for 10 minutes. Remove from the oven and top with the cod fillets. Roast for 12-15 minutes until the cod is just cooked through.
Divide the vegetables between 4 plates, top each with a cod fillet and serve with extra lemon wedges and cracked black pepper if desired.
